price: 在那时，各人将考验自己在生前的行为，他们将被送到安拉——他们真实的保护者那里去，而他们所捏造的已回避他们了。
arabic: هُنَالِكَ تَبۡلُواْ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّآ أَسۡلَفَتۡۚ وَرُدُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَوۡلَىٰهُمُ ٱلۡحَقِّۖ وَضَلَّ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: hunālika tablū kullu nafsin mā aslafat waruddū ilā al-lahi mawlāhumu al-ḥaqi waḍalla ʿanhum mā kānū yaftarūna
